actionConfiguration.body: UPDATE orders SET order_number= '{{Table1.updatedRow.order_number}}', user_id= '{{Table1.updatedRow.user_id}}', shipping_id= '{{Table1.updatedRow.shipping_id}}', order_total= '{{Table1.updatedRow.order_total}}', no_of_items= '{{Table1.updatedRow.no_of_items}}', order_date= '{{Table1.updatedRow.order_date}}', email= '{{Table1.updatedRow.email}}', name= '{{Table1.updatedRow.name}}', phone= '{{Table1.updatedRow.phone}}', currency= '{{Table1.updatedRow.currency}}', shipping_address= '{{Table1.updatedRow.shipping_address}}', shipping_zipcode= '{{Table1.updatedRow.shipping_zipcode}}', shipping_country= '{{Table1.updatedRow.shipping_country}}', billing_address= '{{Table1.updatedRow.billing_address}}', billing_zipcode= '{{Table1.updatedRow.billing_zipcode}}', billing_country= '{{Table1.updatedRow.billing_country}}', order_notes= '{{Table1.updatedRow.order_notes}}', share_notes= '{{Table1.updatedRow.share_notes}}', payment_status= '{{Table1.updatedRow.payment_status}}', status= '{{Table1.updatedRow.status}}', payer_id= '{{Table1.updatedRow.payer_id}}', transaction_reference= '{{Table1.updatedRow.transaction_reference}}', created_at= '{{Table1.updatedRow.created_at}}', updated_at= '{{Table1.updatedRow.updated_at}}' WHERE id= '{{Table1.updatedRow.id}}';
